sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; export default function CartItem({item, value}) { const {id, title, img, price, total, count} = item const {increase, decrease, removeItem} = value return (
product : {title}
price : {price}
decrease(id)}>- {count} increase(id)}>+
removeItem(id)}>
item total : Rp. {total}
) }
